entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:20 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -42.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -42.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -60
Dewpoint: -46.6°C
Wind: NW 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 61 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 39.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 39. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 30 km/h before morning. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 53 in the evening and minus 59 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
